title: Multivariate Probabilistic CRPS Learning with an Application to Day-Ahead Electricity Prices. (arXiv:2303.10019v1 [stat.ML])
abstract: This paper presents a new method for combining (or aggregating or ensembling) multivariate probabilistic forecasts, taking into account dependencies between quantiles and covariates through a smoothing procedure that allows for online learning. Two smoothing methods are discussed: dimensionality reduction using Basis matrices and penalized smoothing. The new online learning algorithm generalizes the standard CRPS learning framework into multivariate dimensions. It is based on Bernstein Online Aggregation (BOA) and yields optimal asymptotic learning properties. We provide an in-depth discussion on possible extensions of the algorithm and several nested cases related to the existing literature on online forecast combination. The methodology is applied to forecasting day-ahead electricity prices, which are 24-dimensional distributional forecasts. translated_title: 多元概率CRPS学习及其在日前电价预测中的应用
translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种考虑分位数和协变量依赖关系的多元概率预测的结合方法，并通过平滑过程允许在线学习。通过维数降低和罚函数平滑等两种平滑方法来将标准CRPS学习框架推广到多元维度中。将该方法应用于预测日前电价，相比于统一组合，在CRPS方面取得了显著改进。
tldr: 本文提出一种新的多元概率CRPS学习方法，应用于日前电价预测中，相比于统一组合在CRPS方面取得了显著改进。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a new method for combining multivariate probabilistic forecasts and applies it to day-ahead electricity price forecasting, achieving significant improvements over uniform combination in terms of CRPS.
